title: Log In

login.p1: If you're a <lnk>patron</lnk> of Poly Haven, logging in here will give you access to your rewards directly on this site.
login.p2: Depending on your support tier, your rewards may include:
login.li2: Early access to assets, before they are released publicly.
login.li3: Access to our cloud service, to sync all of our assets to your hard drive.
login.li4: Sponsor an asset permanently every month, showing your name and link next to the download buttons.
